name: Great Route:Flame
description:
A hidden island appeared after the storm, It is said the island had wonderful treasures.
The pirates were on the prowl and broke the peace at sea.
As the captain, you are also gathering your own crews and start the adventure!

GAME FEATURES

-Hero Summons
Tons of heroes with unique skills at your service！

-Idle system
Your hero will fight for you automatically!

-Turn-based Strategy
Challenge the quests with your wise!

-Real-time PVP
Tons of players from all over the world will compete with you, fight them! And be the pirate king!
